What are you struggling with and how can: Maxaad la halgameysaa oo sidee baan u caawin karnaa?
How did you put into practice the script: Sideed ku celcelisay ku dhaqanka Qorniinka / sheekada aan barannay markii ugu dambeysay ee aan la kulannay?
Who did you share last week's lesson wit: Yaad la wadaagtay casharka usbuucii hore ee la socda oo sidee bay u dhacday?
What needs did you meet in the community: Waa maxay baahiyaha aad ku kulantay bulshada usbuucii hore?
Ask someone to read the passage one para: Weydiiso qof inuu akhriyo marinka hal sadar markiiba.
Have a group member tell it in their own: Hayso xubin koox koox ah u sheeg ereyadooda.
Ask the group if they added anything or: Weydii kooxda haddii ay ku daraan wax ama wax kasta oo banaanka ah.
When you finish with ALL paragraphs, ask: Markaad dhammeysid dhammaan sadarka, weydii qof ka mid ah kooxda inuu u sheego sheekada oo dhan xusuus. Kooxda ha saxeexdo wixii khaladaad ah.
If this passage is true, what behaviour: Haddii tuducdan ay run tahay, dabeecad noocee ah ayaan badali karnaa toddobaadkan?
Who will you tell this story to this wee: Kumaad sheekadan u sheegtaa sheekadan toddobaadkan?
What needs can we meet in the community: Maxay yihiin baahiyaha aan ku kulmi karno bulshada toddobaadkan?
When do you want to meet again?: Goormaad dooneysaa inaad mar kale la kulanto?
Would you like to discover with your fri: Ma jeceshahay inaad la ogaato saaxiibbadaa waxa Ilaah la mid yahay iyo sida Eebbe u doonayo inaad ku noolaato?
Here are some questions to get your disc: Waa kuwan qaar ka mid ah su'aalaha si aad doodahaaga u bilowdo.
Would you like to discover for yourself: Ma jeceshahay inaad naftaada ogaato waxa Ilaah la mid yahay iyo sida Eebbe u doonayo inaad ku noolaato?
Most people like to make these discoveri: Dadka badankood waxay jecel yihiin inay ka dhigaan daah-furka kuwan asxaabtooda.
